description: React component for the front-end chess game interface, managing game state, UI components, and user interactions.

classes.name: MoveListItem
classes.description: Type for move display in MoveList, representing individual moves including move number and notation.

methods.name: boardArrayToPieceMap
methods.description: Converts the board array into a mapping from square notation to piece Unicode characters for rendering.

methods.name: handleSquareClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on squares, managing selection and move attempts.

methods.name: boardSquareHasTurnPiece
methods.description: Checks if the specified square contains a piece belonging to the current player.

methods.name: doMove
methods.description: Executes a move, updating game state, move history, and undo/redo stacks.

methods.name: handleMoveClick
methods.description: Handles clicking on a move in the move list, reverting the game to that state.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Reverts the last move, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: handleRedo
methods.description: Re-applies a move that was undone, restoring the game state.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Resets the game to a fresh start.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the board and game state.

methods.name: handleFlip
methods.description: Reverses the board orientation between white and black.

methods.name: handleExportFEN
methods.description: Exports the current game position as a FEN string.

methods.name: handleImportFEN
methods.description: Imports a position from a pasted FEN string.
